entry.title: MC - Rectangular Sushi Tray Lids 223 x 93 x 30mm - 1200/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 124.99

MC - Rectangular Sushi Tray Lids 223 x 93 x 30mm - 12 x 100/Case

Lids only not combo. Base is separate:

Present your sushi in a completely unique way with this plastic sushi serving tray. Perfect for use at any Asian-inspired restaurant, this tray is a great way to serve and display sushi rolls to your guest for a fun and memorable experience. When finished making your sushi, simply arrange the pieces in the tray to create a beautiful, picture perfect display for your guests! There's even enough room to present the traditional sliced ginger and wasabi in this tray for a truly authentic sushi eating experience. This tray is also great for serving other Japanese dishes such as Yuzu Chicken, Tempura, or Udon.

With this party tray, you can serve multiple patrons at once and offer a wide variety of your signature sushi rolls. Featuring a sleek black base, a vibrant red rim, and beautiful, intricate flowers, this display will add a thematic flair to any eatery. The tray is also made from a durable plastic construction for long-lasting use, and features a wide diameter that provides a sturdy base for unwavering support and stability. Serve your sushi in style with this sushi party tray!

entry.title: Cafe Express - 22 Oz Round Takeout Container Black With Clear Lids - 12x6 Sets/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Café Express
Type: Disposables
Price: 46.99

Instantly improve your take-out service with this Microwaveable black container with lid!

Cafe Express - 22 oz 650ml Black Rectangular Container combo 

The Microwavable Containers provide your establishment an elegant takeout solution to traditional aluminum and foam containers. Containers are stack-able to maximize transportation performance. Dishwasher Safe!

Coming as a combo, this black container includes a clear, tight-fitting lid for optimal product visibility and protection from messes and spills. Its ample capacity makes it perfect for housing salads, pastas, and entrees, and its flat top and bottom ensures easy stacking in to-go bags. Use it for packaging food at your kiosk, food truck, convenience store, or restaurant.

Durable: This container is made of durable, heavy weight polypropylene that's strong enough to support hefty foods without bending or cracking, yet light enough to make transportation simple.

Freezer Friendly: It's freezer-friendly for convenient storage purposes and provides your customers with an easy way to save food for later.

Microwavable: It can be used in the microwave, allowing guests to quickly reheat food in the same vessel it was served in.

Reusable & Recyclable: Both the container and lid are recyclable and simple to clean, making them easy to reuse or dispose of once your guests have finished their meal. Use this versatile container and lid to package your signature to-go items and ensure mess-free transportation.

DETAILS

  • Provide your establishment with a great takeout solution to traditional aluminum and foam containers
  • Containers are stack-able to help maximize transportation performance
  • Base and lids are included in the carton to help eliminate the need to carry multiple skus
  • Food grade
  • Microwave safe
  • Dishwasher safe
  • Freezer safe
  • Leak proof
  • Reusable
  • 100% recyclable
  • Made with recyclable polypropylene
  • Black containers with clear lids

entry.title: Placon - SDLM-2 Clear Plastic Dome Lid For 24 Oz Salad Bowl - 300/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Placon
Type: Disposables
Price: 89.99

Placon - Clear Plastic Dome Lids For 24 Oz Salad Bowls - 300 / Case

Keep your Bowls contained with this clear plastic lid! Perfect for presenting greens, fruits, and pre-made entrees, this clear plastic lid is ideal for take-out orders and fast food restaurants, along with portion storage and display in grocery stores and delis! To ensure the contents stay fresh and isolated from their surroundings, this lid tightly seals food inside while allowing for taller, larger sandwiches, desserts, and other items to be placed inside.

Not only does this lid lock in freshness to give your customers the best quality food, this lid is crack-resistant, giving you peace of mind when it comes to leaks or breaking. Additionally, having a clear construction allows your customers and employees to have quick product identification, and showcases your vibrant colored products.

entry.title: Polar Pak - 5" Extra Deep Dome Hinged Clear Pie/Cake Slice Container - 300/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polar Pak
Type: Disposables
Price: 113.99

 

Polar Pak - 503230 - 5" High Dome Hinged Clear OPS Plastic Pie / Cake Slice Container

Showcase every layer of your bakery, restaurant, or grocery store's cakes and pies with this Polar Pak 503230 5" clear plastic hinged container. This container's high dome lid is great for slices of mile-high pies, meringue pies with a heavy layer of whipped toppings, and layer cakes. Use this container's crystal clear lid to set up eye-catching displays. Then use its efficient design to enable your bakery or grocery store's customers to select containers and carry them home with ease.

Made of durable polyethylene (PETE) plastic with wide ribbing along the sides for added strength, this plastic protects your baked goods. It's resistant to water and oxygen, and does not transmit exterior odors to food products. Plus, this container's durability enables you to stack containers for compact presentation and transportation. Meanwhile, this triangular container's rounded corners prevent your crusts from crumbling after slightly bumping into the edge.

This container's hinged lid and one round lock tab ensures the lid remains securely sealed, but also opens effortlessly. The open tab is located on the front tip of the container, incorporating it into the triangular design. No need to transfer your baked goods to another container, this packaging makes an excellent plate as patrons can eat directly from the container.

Overall Dimensions:
Length: 5 3/8"
Maximum Width: 4 3/8"
Minimum Width: 1 3/4"
Base Height: 2 1/10"
Lid Height: 2 1/10"
Total Height: 4 3/16"

entry.title: Conglom - Chicken Roaster Container Combo Vented - 110 Sets
entry.summary:
Vendor: Conglom
Type: Disposables
Price: 56.99

Conglom - Chicken Roaster Combo Vented - 110 Sets

﻿Offer customers a sturdy solution for their pre-packaged dinners with this large microwavable chicken roaster take out container. It features a clear, dome-shaped lid that allows for excellent product visibility, so you can merchandise your product in an attractive manner and potentially boost impulse sales. The lid is also vented in order to ensure your guests get the freshest quality out of their food.

Snapping securely onto the base, this lid also makes it a breeze for customers to transport the food without any messes or spills. Plus, the sturdy polypropylene construction provides a reliable option that holds up, providing your customers with peace of mind as they take delicious food on the go.

Plastic chicken roaster take-out containers are perfect for selling pre-packaged meals at your grocery store, deli, or chicken barbecue. These containers feature tight fitting, clear plastic lids for excellent product visibility. The sturdy plastic helps to keep heat and moisture inside the meat and makes your meals easy to transport. You can fit an entire roasted chicken or any combination of breasts, wings, and legs in one of these containers.

entry.title: Maple Leaf - H8 - Lids For 8 - 32 Oz Microwavable Clear Deli Container - 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Maple Leaf
Type: Disposables
Price: 89.99

Maple Leaf - H8 - Lids For 8 - 32 Oz Clear Deli Container Heavy - 500/Case

When customers can't get enough of your homemade chicken noodle soup, stews, pasta, and baked beans, let them take it home in this clear deli container! Great for delis, salad bars, or restaurant take-out applications, this container is designed for transporting, storing, and then reheating hot food items. Your customers will appreciate being served a sturdy container that won't leak and will keep their leftovers or deli purchases secure during the ride home. When paired with a compatible flush fit or recessed fit lid (sold separately), this container is leak and spill-proof. The classic round shape holds up to 8 oz. of your most popular hot and cold foods.

Clear For Product Visibility: Once food touches the container, it becomes nearly transparent, making it perfect for showcasing the bright colors of your signature hot items and sauces to make them more appealing to customers.

Great for delis, salad bars, or restaurant take-out applications, this container is designed for transporting, storing, and then reheating hot food items. Clear For Product Visibility: Once food touches the container, it becomes nearly transparent, making it perfect for showcasing the bright colors of your signature hot items and sauces to make them more appealing to customers.
